title: No text on launcher
body: My league launcher has no text in it everywhere I click there is nothing and I don't know why. Even in the settings. I've full repaired I've uninstalled. I tried changing regions to some random regions because It doesn't show which and it seems when I go to Japan the Japanese text shows and when I change to eu the text shows for a second and then goes away. I've had this problem for a while and it wasn't a problem because I just played on the legacy client. Please help me cause I can't play league.

replies.body: I tried EVERYTHING, installed JAVA, FLASH, AIR, last updates on video card etc. UNTIL i got enlightened and launched this damn new client in COMPATIBILITY MOD with Windows XP service pack 2. Now it shows text correctly to me. Good luck on the fields of justice, scrubs <#

Your config files sound like they might have been damaged somehow, so now the client isn't sure what it's supposed to display. We can try manually resetting those files to see if that cleans things up a bit and makes the client readable. 

Go into the default League folder, should be C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config, and then let's just......delete the entire folder. Yup, just go ahead and delete that whole Config folder. Once it's deleted, the client with create new fresh files with the default settings and you should be good to go!
it didnt work bro poro. Its weird because my league reads japanese but not english

Let's try a bit of a different approach for your text not showing up. It could be that the patcher is trying to connect to our servers to figure out what it needs to display, and for some reason, it just can't talk with the servers well enough to get that info. Try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that's not the source of the problem!
Well that doesn't seem to be the problem. I wish I could show you what's wrong and you guide me through it because it's painful not being able to play my favourite game

Heck I wish I could be there to help troubleshoot, as it's sometimes really difficult to do so through a computer =\ .

Imma take you a step up though and get you some one on one help from our tech guys though! Go ahead and hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they've got some pc wizarding skills that will be able to dig much deeper into this text problem for you!
PLease help me i really want to play league

broporo. please help me. my client has just crashed and kicked me out of the game, ive come back and riot has low queued me again... thats the 7th time this week., honestly i literally just wanna cry, this is so unfair! It has been fine for a few games but now its crashing again... please help me.

Wow that **really** sucks that it's your 7th time in LPQ this week =(. We can't do too much about those penalties, but I can definitely help you get those crashes figured out so you don't get hit with that again. 

Without too much context, it's hard to narrow down what may have caused the game to crash. I'd suggest taking some time to go through our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some of the most common fixes. If that doesn't help too much, hit me back and we can dig a little deeper!
